channel.title: aws on MBlog
channel.description: Recent content in aws on MBlog

item.title: Upload Files to Aws S3
item.description: Upload single file to S3 bucket aws s3 cp sample2.txt s3://test-s3-bucket/data/ Upload all files from a folder to S3 bucket recursively aws s3 cp tmp/ s3://test-s3-bucket/data/tmp/ --recursive

item.title: AWS Cloud Front - access denied to S3 bucket
item.description: Original explanation hier After creating cloud front distribution with mapping to my S3 bucket I got this access error: The reason was wrong auto coplete value in this section: What you should to to it’s go to the S3 bucket and grab the URL in the property tab on the down of the tab and put it in the origin domain input of the cloud front. Enjoy!
